titleStmt.title: Two sermons preach'd against immorality and profaneness The first, on January 13. 1698/9. The second, on May 3. 1700. By John Thane, M.A. and one of the prebendaries of Chester.
titleStmt.author: Thane, John, 1653 or 4-1727.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for R. Knaplock, at the Angel and Crown in St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
